BudgetResult.title: BudgetResult
BudgetResult.description: Represents the final, processed output of a successful analysis run.

userId.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user who initiated the processing.

uploadId.description: Reference to the document in the 'uploads' collection.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the processing was completed.

costsByHolder.description: A key-value map where the key is the budget holder and the value is the total cost.

costsByRegion.description: A key-value map where the key is the region and the value is the total cost.

geminiPrompt.description: Optional, for debugging. The exact prompt sent to Gemini for revenue classification.

UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the application.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user was created.

Upload.title: Upload
Upload.description: Represents a file upload record and its processing status.

userId.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user who uploaded the files.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the upload was initiated.

files.description: A map of filenames that were part of this upload.

status.description: The processing status of the upload.

errorMessage.description: If status is 'error', this field contains the reason.

resultId.description: The ID of the corresponding document in the budget_results collection.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, with the document ID matching the user's Firebase Auth UID.
A log of every file upload attempt, tracking its status and associated files.
Stores the final, processed output of a successful analysis run.
